content.webTitle: Pick of the week: South: Exhibitions

fields.headline: Pick of the week: Exhibitions
fields.bodyText: The Syncretic Sense Plymouth Arts Centre, Plymouth A retrospective of the pioneering cybernetic artist Roy Ascott. Patrick Caulﬁeld Pallant House, Chichester Paintings and prints by the pop artist famed for his bleak depictions of cafe life. Nowhere Man Towner Gallery, Eastbourne Chilean artist Iván Navarro bedazzles with his ﬂuorescent light sculptures.
